rules_text:
{1}{B}{R}, Sacrifice another creature: Create a Junk token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Whenever you sacrifice a nonland permanent, Mesa Interloper deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and you gain 1 life.
